By Magma Bird on Thursday, June 1, 2000 - 11:20 am:

I went back in time for the third time and instead of that one guy named hans who was raising a suezo, he is raising a megarock(the thing found in Cox's house). Oh and I am about to get to master class. Have you seen this yet, Eagle?

By Eagle_Fierce on Sunday, June 4, 2000 - 02:46 pm:

By Anonymous on Wednesday, February 14, 2001 - 07:08 am:

You must reach Master class without losing 2 times. Both times you recieve a monster. After this you must all the mural pieces by getting new cards with betting. Old-Paint can be get with copying and out chests. You can copy cards with it. Monstercards too!

By Anonymous on Saturday, February 17, 2001 - 04:02 am:

I almost forget to tell you guys that you also have to keep giving that Suezo/Megarock, the Mochi in the house above yours (with the oldtimers in it), Milkstuff because then you get several times a piece of Mural, so keep doing that until you don't get the question anymore.

By Paul Long Nguyen on Thursday, February 22, 2001 - 04:30 pm:

If you give that suezo or whatever it is at least 15 milkstuff (in one time round that means no starting over from the old ruins) a disk will be given to you and you will have Melenzo (suezo's attack and dino's defense).
